mapper.sql: ${alias}.id, ${alias}.user_id AS userId, ${alias}.following_id AS followingId, ${alias}.following_type AS followingType, ${alias}.create_time AS createTime,
mapper.select:
SELECT f.id, f.user_id userId, f.following_id followingId, u.name followingName, f.following_type followingType FROM social_user_following f
LEFT JOIN user u ON f.following_id = u.id
LEFT JOIN nutritionist u ON f.following_id = u.id
WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.following_type = #{followingType} ORDER BY f.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
